Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Key.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.
Key.markdownDescription:
The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.
Value.markdownDescription:
The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

InstanceArn.description: The identifier of the Amazon Connect instance that has been replicated.
InstanceArn.markdownDescription:
The identifier of the Amazon Connect instance that has been replicated.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 250  
Pattern: ^arn:(aws|aws-us-gov):connect:[a-z]{2}-[a-z]+-[0-9]{1}:[0-9]{1,20}:instance/[a-f0-9]{8}-[a-f0-9]{4}-[a-f0-9]{4}-[a-f0-9]{4}-[a-f0-9]{12}$  
Update requires: No interruption

Description.description: A description for the traffic distribution group.
Description.markdownDescription:
A description for the traffic distribution group.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 250  
Pattern: (^[\S].*[\S]$)|(^[\S]$)  
Update requires: Replacement

Name.description: The name for the traffic distribution group.
Name.markdownDescription:
The name for the traffic distribution group.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: (^[\S].*[\S]$)|(^[\S]$)  
Update requires: Replacement

Tags.markdownDescription:
One or more tags.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

TrafficDistributionGroupArn.description: The identifier of the traffic distribution group.
TrafficDistributionGroupArn.markdownDescription:
The identifier of the traffic distribution group.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^arn:(aws|aws-us-gov):connect:[a-z]{2}-[a-z]+-[0-9]{1}:[0-9]{1,20}:traffic-distribution-group/[a-f0-9]{8}-[a-f0-9]{4}-[a-f0-9]{4}-[a-f0-9]{4}-[a-f0-9]{12}$  
Update requires: No interruption

Status.description: The status of the traffic distribution group.
Status.markdownDescription:
The status of the traffic distribution group.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: CREATION_IN_PROGRESS | ACTIVE | CREATION_FAILED | PENDING_DELETION | DELETION_FAILED | UPDATE_IN_PROGRESS  
Update requires: No interruption

IsDefault.description: If this is the default traffic distribution group.
IsDefault.markdownDescription:
If this is the default traffic distribution group.

---

Required: No  
Type: Boolean  
Update requires: No interruption
